title: Spare hours...
author: Brown, John
snippet: Young Moir was going to the neighboring village  of Greenburn to the fair to buy cattle ; the green purse was in requisition, and his wife, then nursing her first child, went with him.

title: Spare hours...
author: Brown, John
snippet: The lady of the Castle, loath, we doubt not, to leave her " bonnie house," persuaded Mr. Moir to take instead the properties of Stoneywood, Watterton, Clin- terty, and Greenburn, on Don side, which were afterwards conjoined under the name of the barony of Stoneywood.
